issue.title: [Java] Bump Netty version
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9370](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9370). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As per https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7619#issuecomment-655246147 there is a security vulnerability in the current version of Netty. This will upgrade to latest version

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9370?focusedCommentId=17154202) by Bryan Cutler (bryanc):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7677
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7677>
